questions.question: A 22-k Ω resistor and a 0.02-μF capacitor are connected in series to a 5-V source. How long will it take the capacitor to charge to 3.4 V?
A monostable 555 timer has the following number of stable states
In a typical IC monostable multivibrator circuit, at the falling edge of the trigger input, the output switches HIGH for a period of time determined by the ________.

answers.a: value of the RC timing components
answers.d: magnitude of the dc supply voltage

questions.question: What is the one is not input to the IC 555 timer?
